title: Oscars: Stars pick their film highlights
description: BBC News speaks to stars of the silver screen about their film highlights ahead of the Oscars.
content:
The red carpet is being rolled out for the Oscars on Sunday, with Lincoln, Life Of Pi and Silver Linings Playbook among the main nominees.

But what do movie stars think the film highlight of the last year has been?

BBC News spoke to some stars of the silver screen in the lead up to the Oscars.
